sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SecurityAuditTablePicker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>select tables to audit</description>
        <name>SecurityAuditTablePicker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SecurityAuditTablePicker = Class.create();
SecurityAuditTablePicker.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    process: function() {
        var tableArray = [];
	    var tables = GlideProperties.get("glide.security.audit.tables");
        var tableList = GlideStringUtil.split(tables);
        for(var i = 0; i < tableList.size(); i++) {
            tableArray.push( tableList.get(i) );
        }
	return tableArray;
    },

    type: 'SecurityAuditTablePicker'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-08-07 00:01:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>07da56f44320311095f682d63bb8f20c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SecurityAuditTablePicker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Identity Security Audit" source="com.glide.security.audit">5f88935b47220210cd4e1ce4316d439a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_07da56f44320311095f682d63bb8f20c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-09 23:09:01</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
